name: Multi-Bots
description:
a game where you are a bulb-bot thing that explodes every 10-15 seconds.

Controls:

left mouse: to move to mouse position.

right mouse: while on a corpse to get more time but less speed.

midle mouse: while on a corpse to get more speed but less time.

Credits:

Me: all assets, except sound effects.

GameSupplyGuy: 1000+ Nintendo SFX 

Link:https://gamesupply.itch.io/1000-nintendo-sound-effects
